.. _labreportpy:

===========
labreportpy
===========

.. currentmodule:: labreportpy

**Version**: |version| | **Date**: |today|

**Useful links**:
`Source Repository <https://github.com/aknierim/labreportpy>`__ |
`Issue Tracker <https://github.com/aknierim/labreportpy/issues>`__ |
`Pull Requests <https://github.com/aknierim/labreportpy/pulls>`__

**License**: `MIT <https://github.com/aknierim/labreportpy/blob/main/LICENSE>`__

**Python**: |python_requires|

``labreportpy`` is a small collection of tools and functions that may be useful for
the analysis of data obtained in experiments in laboratory courses for physics.
